title: New: Rochelle Jordan – Here I Go
body:
Photo Credit: **Malcolm Gray**

As fate would have it, Canadian songstress **Rochelle Jordan** appeared in our third [Sound of 2012](http://http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13124-sound-of-2012-part-3-josh/) section, only just a few hours ago. So, if you needed any further temptation to check out her music, here it is, in the form of new track _Here I Go_. Where **Drake** is too soppily cliched and **The Weeknd** is too sleazy, Jordan squeezes herself in the middle, hitting the honest and emotional yet sensual and classy nail right on the head. This number appears pretty heavily **Beyonce** inspired, with the repetitive, slightly wooden beat lending itself to **Jordan’s** sassy vocals. Check out _Here I Go_ below.
